definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

pinyin: Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2 Luo4 shan1 ji1 Fen1 xiao4
containing_words.word: 加利福尼亞大學洛杉磯分校

sentences.english: In Los Angeles you need to take a connecting flight to New York.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉磯您需要轉乘中轉聯程航班到紐約。

sentences.english: Yoga is very popular especially in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽在洛杉磯尤其流行。

sentences.english: Here in L.A., installation is charged separately.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉磯，安裝費都是分開來收取的。

sentences.english: I'll be glad to drive you out to Narita when you go to L. A.
sentences.chinese: 你去洛杉磯的時候，我很願意開車送你去成田機場。

sentences.english: Lime tree coffee shop reminds me of Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 酸橙樹咖啡館使我想起了洛杉磯。

sentences.english: LA is a place where people come to live their dreams.
sentences.chinese: 人們來到洛杉磯希望實現他們的夢想。

sentences.english: The former Manchester United player's contract with Los Angeles Galaxy runs out at the end of December.
sentences.chinese: 前曼聯球星與洛杉磯銀河隊的合同12底就將到期。

sentences.english: Yeah, driving in LA, it's really unpredictable and can be dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 是的，在洛杉磯開車，真的沒法預測，可能很危險。

sentences.english: but because Los Angeles is so big and so spread out, it's kind of difficult.
sentences.chinese: 但是因爲洛杉磯太大，面積太廣，這很難。

sentences.english: Watching was our LA correspondent Peter Bowes.
sentences.chinese: 請看我們的洛杉磯通訊員彼得波爾斯。

sentences.english: AJ Duffy is president of the United Teachers Los Angeles union. Mr.
sentences.chinese: AJ達菲是美國洛杉磯教師聯合會主席。

sentences.english: Many people like to visit Disneyland when they take a trip to L. A.
sentences.chinese: 許多人都洛杉磯旅行時，喜歡去參觀迪斯耐樂園。

sentences.english: What platform does the limited express for Los Angeles depart from?
sentences.chinese: 往洛杉磯的特快車在幾站臺？

sentences.english: Is it a non-stop flight from Los Angeles to Seattle?
sentences.chinese: 從洛杉磯到西雅圖是不經停的吧？

sentences.english: Van Sant went to Los Angeles in 1976.

definition: club (the organisation or its premises) (loanword)/CL:個|个[ge4]
